sn9.9:1.1: Ekam samayam annataro vajjiputtako bhikkhu vesaliyam viharati annatarasmim vanasande.
sn9.9:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena vesaliyam vajjiputtako sabbaratticaro hoti.
sn9.9:1.3: Atha kho so bhikkhu vesaliya turiyatalitavaditanigghosasaddam sutva paridevamano tayam velayam imam gatham abhasi:
sn9.9:3.1: Atha kho ya tasmim vanasande adhivattha devata tassa bhikkhuno anukampika atthakama tam bhikkhum samvejetukama yena so bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn9.9:5.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu taya devataya samvejito samvegamapaditi.
